name: Cyclepath Rider
description:
Sometimes it takes a little thunder to deal with the big bikes in the world... Take on the role of Rolling Thunder, and see if you can survive a pitched boss battle in this beautifully animated 100 hour game jam prototype!

Created for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3, this is the product of both Liz Fox and Tyler Power, and represents our first ever published game! Its not much, we had to learn most of it on the fly, but its here, and we hope you enjoy it! Let us know what you think. If the reception is kind enough, maybe we'll revisit it in the future and give it some love.
